titleStmt.title: His Majesties most gracious speech to both Houses of Parliament, on Thursday the 22th [sic] day of October, 1691.
Speeches. 1691-10-22.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Charles Bill and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb deceas'd; printers to the King and Queens most Excellent Majesties,

notesStmt.note: A request for payment for the Army for the war in Ireland and to maintain both Army and Navy in preparation for the coming war with France.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

person.persName: Charles Bill and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb deceas'd;
